original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: kāyasasaggam sādiyana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti khandhānam katihi āpatti khandhehi saṅgahitā

original: Kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ pañcahi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
analyzed: kāyasasaggam sādiyana paccayāḥ āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam pañcahi āpatti kkhandhehi saṅgahitā

original: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā saṅghādisesāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena …pe….
analyzed: siyā pārājika āpatti kkhandhena siyā saṅgha ādisesa āpatti kkhandhena siyā thullaccaya āpatti kkhandhena siyā pācittiya āpatti kkhandhena siyā dukkaṭa āpatti kkhandhena pe

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ katihi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā?
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjana paccayā āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam katihi āpatti kkhandhehi saṅgahitā

original: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjanapaccayā āpattiyo sattannaṁ āpattikkhandhānaṁ dvīhi āpattikkhandhehi saṅgahitā—
analyzed: dadhim viññāpetvā bhuñjana paccayā āpattiyaḥ sattannam āpatti kkhandhānam dvīhi āpatti kkhandhehi saṅgahitā
siyā pāṭidesanīya āpatti khandhena siyā dukkaṭa āpatti khandhena
